page.title: 17Parks in St. Andrews
page.content: The three most popular parks in St.Andrews are{Spinkie Den,Cockshaugh} and{Woodburn Park.} Spinkie Den is just off Bogward Road.It has a lot of open space and a large variety of play equipment for young children. There is also a large wooded area with a burn flowing through it. Cockshaugh is part of{Lade Braes Walk} which is designated as a Nature Conservation Area.In this park there is a football pitch which can be hired for club games.There is also some play equipment for young children.The{ {Kinness Burn}flows through Lade Braes. Woodburn Park is just off Glebe Road.There is a slide which goes down a big hill,swings,a roundabout and a lot of open space.There is a burn running through it.
